sentences.en: Eventually the bailiffs came to repossess the flat.
sentences.cn: 查封官终于来收公寓了。

sentences.en: I've been authorized to repossess this property.
sentences.cn: 我已经被核可重新拥有这笔财产.

sentences.en: If you get behind in your car payments, the finance company may repossess it from you.
sentences.cn: 一旦你迟缴汽车贷款, 融资公司可能会把你的车子要回去.

sentences.en: The house was in default and the bank will repossess it.
sentences.cn: 房子拖欠贷款,银行会将其回收.

trans.tran_en: to take back cars, furniture, or property from people who had arranged to pay for them over a long time, but cannot now continue to pay for them

trans.tran_cn: 取回，收回，重新获得，把占有权还给…。
